page.title: 20PARTNEY FESTIVAL JUNE 1985
page.content: Partney last held a festival in 1978. They can not have one every year,because there is too much work. They thought it was a good idea to get people working together.The prepartions took at least 2 months before hand.A Lot of people came because the church was open all day. The festival started at 11 o,clock and lasted till evening.The festival was a success.People seemed to enjoy different parts.1 or 2 people came to the services who never came before. They cannot hold one next year because it takes too much arranging.They expect in the future,quite a few changes,for instance there could be a lady vicar. In this area there,were 15 clergy in 1970 but now there are only seven.
